lines.text: Which one of you guys is Lacey?

lines.character: Ed Lacey, Sportswriter Punched by Thorpe

lines.text: Well, how do you feel, Chief?
Bed soft. Make Little Boy soft. How do you like things?
lines.character: Little Boy Who Walk Like Bear

lines.text: If every Indian was as soft as you, the population of this country would still be in Rhode Island.

[to Jim's father]
You're his father. You taught him all the things he likes to do. Now teach him what he has to do!
